Allen Tanner Headley passed away unexpectedly on March 16, 2018 at the age of 31 while on duty at Plaquemines Parish Fire Department. Beloved husband of Lauren Plaisance Headley. Father of Catherine Herron. Son of Anthony Bourgeois and the late Barbara Headley. Brother of Justin M. Bourgeois and Ryan P. Bourgeois. Grandson of Elizabeth Anne Headley (late Allen) and Mildred Bourgeois (late Arthur). Uncle of Christian Bourgeois. Cousin of Megan Dufresne, Elizabeth Scott, T.C. Parks, and Margaret-Anne Parks. Son-in-law of Jane and Eloi Plaisance. A native of Gretna, LA, and resident of Pensacola, FL and Belle Chasse, LA since 2009. Allen was a Fireman and Certified EMT with Plaquemines Parish Fire Department since 2010.
